video_title: Startup idea: Med school in a weekend [CLIP]

content_profile.title: Startup idea: Med school in a weekend [CLIP]

key_takeaways: Solution: Use social proof and viral content strategy with Huberman clips (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Huberman clip explanation format for viral content (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Get testimonials from recognizable people in health/fitness space (Channel: community)
Strategy: Start with higher pricing ($497) instead of low pricing ($49) to build trust
Strategy: Evolution from course to career certification company

startup_ideas.title: Med School in a Weekend - simplified medical curriculum course
startup_ideas.target_market: Health optimization enthusiasts, pre-med students, healthcare workers
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Gap between complex medical knowledge and general understanding of health optimization
startup_ideas.business_model: Online course sales starting at $497, evolution to certification business
startup_ideas.validation: High engagement from pitch, available domain, strong market interest in health optimization
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: Minimal - mainly content creation and marketing

startup_ideas.title: Law School in a Weekend - business law fundamentals
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Dense legal knowledge that entrepreneurs need but can't access easily
startup_ideas.business_model: Similar course model focusing on business law applications
startup_ideas.validation: Immediate interest from entrepreneurs in the room

trend_opportunities.title: Human optimization and health hacking mainstream adoption
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Educational gap between expert content and consumer understanding

trend_opportunities.title: Simplified professional education in weekend formats
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Apply to other professional fields beyond medicine (law, business, etc.)
